We are committed to protecting your privacy when you use our mobile applications (the "App"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information in connection with the App. ======= description: for Find The Hidden Objects Puzzle ---

Xonty built the Find The Hidden Objects Puzzle app as an Ad Supported app. This service is provided by Xonty at no cost and is intended for use as is.

We are committed to protecting your privacy when you use our mobile application "Find The Hidden Objects Puzzle" (the "App"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information in connection with the App.

If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. >>>>>>> e1099c546eb1dfb0dce203d631b35a7e8dd5b25a


1. Personal Information <<<<<<< HEAD

We may collect the following personal information from you:

  • Information you provide to us directly when for example emailing us, such as your name, and email address.
  • The information related to the IP address and user product information that is shared with our adversing network. For more information, please see Sections 2 and 3).

    • 2. How We Use Your Personal Information

    We use your personal information to:

  • Provide and improve the App, including personalizing your experience.
  • To provide you with personalised advertisement.
  • Respond to your inquiries and fulfill your requests.
  • Comply with our legal obligations, such as keeping records of our communications with you.

    • 3. How We Share Your Personal Information

    We may share your personal information with:

  • Third-party advertisers/ad networks, AdMob, who require the data to select and serve relevant ads to you.
  • We use AdMob, which is a third-party advertising network. Because of that we may disclose some information to them, i.e. IP address, user product interaction, diagnostic information, device and account identifiers, for more information please see https://developers.google.com/admob/android/privacy/play-data-disclosure , their privacy policy https://policies.google.com/privacy and https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites
  • For AdMob to show personalised ads based on user's interests, it uses the device's advertising ID. To opt-out of customized advertising, see this Google page: https://myadcenter.google.com =======

    We store information on your device relating to your age to allow for a more accurate treatment of the ads that we serve to you. The information is retained on your device and is not collected by us in any way.

    For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to internet access and analytics used for ads generated by AdMob.

    This is done so that we can:

  • serve you with basic ads based on the content you’re viewing, the app you’re using, your approximate location, or your device type
  • we can measure ad performance
  • we can measure content performance
  • we can develop and improve our game


    • The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. We may share your personal information with:

  • Google Play Services, you can view their privacy policy at https://policies.google.com/privacy
  • We use AdMob, which is a third-party advertising network. Because of that we may disclose some information to them, i.e. IP address, user product interaction, diagnostic information, device and account identifiers, for more information please see https://developers.google.com/admob/android/privacy/play-data-disclosure , their privacy policy https://policies.google.com/privacy and https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites >>>>>>> e1099c546eb1dfb0dce203d631b35a7e8dd5b25a
  • Law enforcement agencies or other governmental bodies if required by law.

    4. Your Rights and Choices =======

    We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf;
  • To perform Service-related services; or
  • To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

    • We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.


    3. Your Rights and Choices >>>>>>> e1099c546eb1dfb0dce203d631b35a7e8dd5b25a

    You have the following rights with respect to your personal information:

  • The right to access and receive a copy of your personal information.
  • The right to request correction of your personal information.
  • The right to request erasure of your personal information.
  • The right to object to processing of your personal information.
  • The right to withdraw your consent to processing of your personal information.

    • You may exercise these rights by contacting us using the contact information provided below.

    We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it. We implement reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
